name: NXT: The Game
description:
NXT: The Game Beta 1.0.0.0 Developer: Kuzey Vural (GXY Official)NXT IS FULLY CHANGED. Game Features
  • 5 Different levels
  • Save system
  • Main menu
  • Options
  • Fullscreen switch
  • Resolutions(min 360p max1080)
  • Spike throwers
  • Walls & activateable buttons
  • Soundtrack
  • Sound effects
  • Stage 1
Controls

W A S D or Arrow Keys to Move

CTRL + M to Menu

SHIFT + M to Off/On Music

CTRL + R to Restart

Arrow Keys (Up-Down) to Swap menu buttons

Space to Select menu buttons

You can scroll down and click download button to play !

If you see any bugs or errors please comment ! !

Your suggestions are very important for us.

Thank you for playing and supporting.

Please rate !

Goodbyeee !!!

- GXY Official Creator: Kuzey Vural
